channel.title: Traveling on Alessio Greggi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Traveling on Alessio Greggi's Blog

item.title: Funny Stories From My Trips - part 1
item.description:
I still vividly remember my first real trip.

It was early March 2011. My friends and I booked a super cheap flight to London for a one-night trip (we’d be back the following afternoon). At the time, Ryanair was offering incredibly cheap flights from Italy, making it possible for broke students like us to jump at the chance. If I’m not mistaken, I paid just 19â‚¬ for a round trip to London. Since then, I’ve been lucky enough to take many trips and collect some stories along the way.
